content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i had stepped outside to have a cigarette and were talking. i noticed a light to the right of me, thought it was a plane then noticed white lights front and rear, no blue , red or green. when it visually cleared our trees we saw that it was huge. this was not a airplane or a blimp, as far as i know there are no aircraft that we possess that are over 200 yards long and can fly with no noise. we watched it travel across our line of sight, it was a clear night with only minimal cloud cover to our west with a setting moon that shone light on the object. it was solid black, a large burning light on the front and a smaller glowing light at the rear. the strangest part was that there was a vapor trail coming from the front of the craft, not the rear. we watched it until it was out of sight, it traveled se to nw. members of my family are military and private sector pilots, i have been around aircraft almost my entire life and have seen other strange unexplained objects, but nothing of this clarity or size. this was most certainly, without a doubt , other-worldly.
content.summary: Huge object at least 200 or more yards long , light on front and rear only floated directly in front of our home, no sound or engine noise detectable . clear calm night with partial moon to our left and object came into view from our right.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from marsing i saw a large bar-shaped object hovering in the sky. it had defined edges and star-like lights placed in equi-distant intervals along the length. it hovered above in the sky above nampa-caldwell and slowly faded against the horizon.
content.summary: Large bar-like object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out to smoke a cig looking due west .I saw from the south a bright ball going straight across the horizon about 20 degrees up (at the closest it was over utah the farthest ?)the trail behind it was huge with an object trailing behind about a fingers width. at first sight i thought it was a plane (to low to fast)from south to north horizon aprox 8-10 seconds. lost sight on the north horizon behind the mountains. looked at the clock right after.
content.summary: South to north just above the horizon

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving back home from school on rd 18 headed east toward medina. i thought it was a bright star but then as i got closer it got bigger and i noticed a bright multicolored angled edge ontop of the light like it was a rope of light or something. still getting closer i noticed there were two main lights close together and tiny blinking lights beside the two big ones and abother light near the top toward the center space of the main lights. when i was under it i stuck my head out the car window and looked up at it and it still had all the lights and looked rectangular shaped. i could tell it wasn't moving. i saw another one when i pulled into my driveway on 301 and it made a circle. i looked up pics of drones and other lights in the sky including plane lights and helicopter lights but i can't explain what i saw.
content.summary: Two main white lights with 3 small flashing lights. angle shape on top with multicolored edges

content.detailedDescription:
Saw my first ever ufo today, february 23, 2015, at 11 a.M. pacific time. by ufo, i mean unidentified floating object – it was not flying – had no wings, no tail, no rotors. there was no sound, though as far away as it was, even if it had been an airplane i might not have heard it. there was no condensation trail behind it. the movement of the cigar-shaped white object was so slow that it appeared to be simply floating along at perhaps about 30-40 mph. there’s a possibility it may have been a drone – i’ve not seen all the types of drones the military has these days, and there is a base nearby, so who knows? it could have been ours, but maybe it wasn’t. i don’t know. here’s what happened.
i had just pulled out of the post office parking lot on jefferson street in olympia, washington, and turned right (north). after one block jefferson street makes a curve to the nw and as i was looking ahead during the curve (first gorgeous blue sky day we’ve had in a while) a white cylindrical shape in the distant sky caught my attention. as a cloud watcher i am often looking at the sky, and this object caught my attention as it did not look like a normal airplane. it was long, cylindrical, no wings, tail or rotors, no windows as far as i could tell. it was hard to tell how far away it was – i would guess perhaps anywhere from 1.5 to 2 miles away. elevation (guessing again) may have been .5 to one mile high. it’s really hard to tell as there was nothing to triangulate it with. i am a pilot, though i haven’t flown in years, and i’ve sailed across the pacific ocean from sausalito, ca to hawaii, and hiked many wilderness trails alone for up to three weeks at a stint, so i’m used to seeing unusual things, but never anything like this before.
as i was driving on jefferson and it became adam street, i decided to watch it as it was so intriguing, so i pulled over to the sidewalk in front of a yellow fire hydrant (there was nowhere else to park) and watched it for perhaps 3-5 minutes before i couldn’t see it anymore. here’s what it did during those minutes.
from my viewpoint it was to my wnw, and was headed south, maybe a tweak to the southwest, moving very slowly, silently, for about one minute of my watch time, when suddenly it veered sharply to its right – due west – so now all i could see was the dot of its circumference. the whiteness of the object was getting dimmer as it moved further west, and suddenly i noticed a bright pomegranate colored flash below it to the south, then another less brilliant flash a little further away, then a third even dimmer and further still away. they were like light flashes, nothing exploding, not flares, and were all in a single southern and lower trajectory from the craft. that was bizarre, then a few seconds later the craft made an abrupt turn and was longwise to my view again, pointing south.  it seemed to just hover there for maybe ten seconds, not proceed further south. then it abruptly turned west again and within a few seconds there was another brilliant flash off the side of the craft – a brilliant whitish green electric colored flash – white on the far side, greener closer to the craft. that flash was fan shaped, different that the burst of round light previously seen.  the fanned-out part of the white-green flash was away from the craft, while the narrow part of the fan-shape was right near the craft. 
i kept watching and it got harder and harder to see, as it was moving slowly further away. i started up the truck and drove over to a parking area on capitol lake, got out and continued looking for it, but didn’t see it again. lots of people were out walking around the lake, and after maybe an hour of me walking around it slowly while still searching the sky, i finally got back to the truck, drove to do a quick errand, then decided to drive back to where i had originally seen it. i took photos of the location, made a quick video, got back in the truck and was about to drive away when i saw something that almost looked like the same white cigar shape again – same location in the sky – only this time it was higher and harder to see than it had been the first time. i watched it closely but it disappeared as it headed south much more quickly than the first one – within maybe ten seconds – due to its higher elevation and distance from me – not to its speed, as it was still slow.
there is an airport to the south of olympia and i frequently see low flying planes coming in on approach, but that flight pattern is different than where these objects were flying. these were too high for approach and way too far west. the best i can figure is they were above west olympia and the southernmost shores of puget sound heading southwest and west which would take them (or at least the first one) over black lake and perhaps on over to the capitol state forest. don’t know what it or they were, but i do know the first one was not a plane, helicopter or any other craft i am familiar with.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White cigar shaped craft floating slowly made sharp turns and fired bright light flashes

content.detailedDescription:
1 junita river in wooden rowboat jitterbug fishing with 2 friends
2 we were looking at the night sky looking for spudnic when we saw what appeared to be a single white star moving north at about the speed we thought spudnic would move.
3 spudnic
4 at first it appeared to be a single moving white star but as it got up to a 30-40 degree location we made it out to be 3 white stars in a tight triangle.
at near about the fourty degree location it suddenly and sharply turned northwest shooting off at a very high speed.
5 i was young and really got excited and a little scared too and desided to head quickly back to the dock and home.
6 it moved at a constant slow speed untill the turn then shot off to the right of the dirction it was at with extreamly high speed.
content.summary: 3 white lights in latenight starfield

content.detailedDescription: This is not a water drop on my lens -- i was watching the sky -- a red light suddenly appeared way up in the ionosphere seemingly from nowhere (i watch the planes and chemtrails all day so i know what craft and planes are around very aware) -- the light flew up on a diagonal trajectory to a certain position thus led me to believe is not a star -- some sort of something -- upon gathering my nikon p500 - this is the imagery that i was able to grab -- put it in a photo editor to enlarge the image -- i did nothing to the images other than adding a filter to 2 of them.....This whatever it is, appears to be circular ring of fire/light with a small dot in the middle -- now this thing was i bet 40 km up in the sky or more -- could barely even see it with naked eye, but i watched it as it flew from the south to the south west up higher then stopped in a certain spot -- interestingly it was not so easy to snap the shot even o my tripod. curious as to what it may be.
content.summary: Red light moving up in the sky - stops - sits there once in position

content.detailedDescription:
1 of 3 reports i will file. and never speak of it again!

the following events took place at the ten oaks apartment complex that sits adjacent to route 13, just east and south of carterville, illinois. i was 5-years-old at the time, all memories are photographic and i dislike it - tend to overload on ocassion.

i was learning how to ride my bicycle when my attention was drawn to a crowd that was gathering at the pool area. it was a normal warm night, very clear. as i walked toward the crowd, the words "check it out" were accompanied by pointing in the direction of si bowl, just south of route 13. as my eyes fell on the structure, a white - orange pulsating light, egg or pear shape in form, was bouncing up, down, sideways in the southern horizon like a modern day tracer-light or sparkler that you would use for 4th of july - making shapes. the bottom half would pulsate as the top smaller half remained a brilliant white. to describe it perfectly would be a small group of fireflies, dancing in the southern sky - but 10 times more brilliant. we watched for about an hour until the light stopped in the sky and changed to complete white. it pulsed once and then rocketed straight up and disappeared. i don't recall feeling any fear - a couple of people did run for home. being a child, i felt more puzzlement and awe then fear. having come from a military family, i've seen my share of flight characteristics from aircraft and i know that we still can not duplicate this objects actions today - it simply defied modern physics.

multiple witnesses exist for this account. i don't have names to give or the resources to track down each individual. but i know that what i saw i can not explain...And that is saying something.

i just wanted to get this on record. i don't need or want attention and would like to remain anonymous. if you're a skeptic, i feel sorry for you - for no mortal man or woman can truly envision what is out there. time will tell though, time will tell.

thank you,

chris
content.summary: Bouncing, brilliant, white - orange light. random, finally ascending and shooting upward.

content.detailedDescription: Was on the roof watching stars in night sky...Saw a bright red light,then green light then bright blue then white light then bright white light as a beam at me from about 2000 feet or lower...Changed direction nine times from up to down forward to backward...Three others witnessed event in yards next to house.Looked like it  rolled a few times one way then stopped zigged zagged then short stop lights flashing about 45seconds...Moved forward slowest then fast to gone out of sight...Was this communication ? no sound...But on an average this or something like it does happen one to five times a day i am on roof watching stars.No one seems to believe but not plane or jet or copter...Just seem to flash lights at me as they pass by...But this particular moment was worth talking about.
content.summary: A light blinking red then green ,blue,white then bright white

content.detailedDescription: I when outside as i usually do ,but, my youngest son was outside already and when i got out he tells me " i just seen a orange ball flying around and went that way and went in the clouds" i was like oh yeah, what did you see,, did it make any sounds, "no",,he says,, when suddenly he goes " look there another one"" i look up over at where hes pointing,,and there it was, at first it i was shocked, this was nothing i every seen or heard about,,it was a large orange orb,,not a ship,craft,disk or cigar shape thing.. i couldn't figure out," what can be small enough to be driving such a object"..I finally figured that i could go up and get my camera because it was going very slow at the time,,,i bought this camera a few months after my first sighting[fire/orange with 7 lights] i got my camera and got a few minutes of it, and it came out pretty good..No sounds, it was much lighter outside than my camera shows...
content.summary: Fire/orange orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home after the family's new-year party, i had ceded my room to an uncle to let him stay-over at our house, so i was to sleep at my parent's studio, all this located on the second storey of a 1950's double hight ceiling concrete house, i could not fall asleep so i set up the vcr to watch "hook" and about half an hour into the movie out of nowhere the deafening sound of a turbine on top of the house, i was startled, but foremost i was scared, truly scared. first, as i was materially shaking i ventured into the hall by opening the door and was startled by the darkness, pitch black, and the sound was louder, so i shut the door and bolted it, as the room had two doors i locked them and bolted them, then i ventured into the window that was facing the back garden, i opened it and tried to peer up into the night, but as before, everything was black, like tar, i could barely make-out the silhouettes of the trees on the back of the house, what struck me odd is the lack of down-draft that usually comes accompanied by the sound, as with any air-plane turbine, also the sound was deafening, so i closed the window, i wanted to call-out to my mother and father as well as my brother but was too scared, so as i was making-up my mind and building-up courage i sat on the sofa and before i knew i had passed-out, the next thing i remember was waking-up in the morning all startled because it all felt like a second or the blink of an eye, in the sofa and the sheets and blankets had been set-up as in a bed but too perfectly, when i clearly remember that i had them folded right besides me the moment that i sat down to ponder whether i should or i shouldn't call-out my family, i was also startled by the fact that i was lying in the sofa as on a hospital bed, face-up, arms outside sheets and blankets besides my body, wrinkle free. after i woke-up i asked my brother if he had heard anything and he told me that yes, but he was too scared to come out of his room, we have not discussed this events for years.

i thought this was probably a figment of my imagination but lately, as i live in montreal, i made a trip to mexico on september 19th, 2011 and was singled out by tsa at the airport for a revision, stripped-off every piece of jewellery, coins, shoes, etc. the tsa agent was scanning me with a wand when suddenly at my right foot the wand beeped and made me take my sock off, to his surprise no scar, no marks, nothing, then he proceeded with the rest of my body and precisely on the right clavicle the wand beeped again, he seemed annoyed as if he got me with a chain or something, so he kind of jerked the polo open to find nothing, because i have never had orthopaedic surgery of any kind, scar-less skin, then i could see the fear in his eyes, he just mumbled to put my socks and shoes on and to go without taking eyes off my person, with true awe and fear. i am concerned.
content.summary: Watching movie after family's new-year party when suddenly a turbine erupted over the house.

content.detailedDescription: Hi this might seem a little silly but its easy to check out .Iwas watching the movie longest yard the new one with adam sandler in it about half way  through the guys are on the football field practising just after the warden in the movie has soucked the grass, anyways if you watch carefully two u.Fo.S appear in the sky one behaving strangely in the top left area of the sky and then with just a second onother one comes screaming across the horizon and gone out of picture,cant say i founf something for sure but check it out you cant missit when you no its there.
content.summary: Background of movie

content.detailedDescription: At about 6 12 p.M. on 2/22/15 i was sitting in my living room watching television. i have a hundred and 80 degree windows that are 11 feet high i happened to notice just over the roof of the house next door a kite like object floating by. i picked up my binoculars to look at it and was surprised that it had wings that were shaped like bird wings and there were two of them one on either side, the back part of the wings were scalloped, the front part of the wings  i could see it very clearly were smooth. where the wings came together was an object about 3 feet long is my guess and maybe 2 to 3 feet wide and about a couple feet high. i watched it float by thinking it was a kite. i live very close to the bay of newport and i watched it as it was probably 300 to 400 feet off the ground. as it went towards the bridge , all of a sudden a second object just like the first one came into view into my binoculars and shortly thereafter they kept coming in from different directions and at the end there were five of these objects they all looked the same.I watched them for about i'm going to say 5 to 10 minutes until they literally disappeared towards  the horizon to the pacific ocean. they did not make a sound that i was aware of i saw no propeller or any type of engine on them and i believe they were too small to have been a ufo my only thought at the time was maybe they were some type of a drone but they came in from several directions met about two miles past the bridge in newport and went straight out over the horizon until they were not visible.  they were a solid gray blackish color.
content.summary: {rjl} 5

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the patio in my back yard, gazing at the stars, as i usually do on clear or mostly clear nights, when, shortly after 7pm, i observed a bright object slowly approaching from the wnw. the object was, gold/copper in color, with no flashing “running lights”, as is seen on aircraft. the object was flying below 30,000 feet, gave off no noise, and was brighter than any aircraft i have seen.

as the object approached, a 2-engine turbo-prop plane approached from the north, presumably from bellingham international airport. as the airplane came into view, the bright object slowed and came to a near stop until the airplane passed by. then the object changed trajectory, heading ssw and upward at a more than 45 degree angle, slowly fading from view. the object was in view for approximately 2-3 minutes.

i grew up around aircraft, and live in the flight path of military aircraft from the nearby naval air station, and am very familiar with civilian, commercial, and military aircraft and their behavior and appearance.

i am also an amateur astronomer, familiar with the behavior of astronomical phenomena. the object observed did not behave in any manner i am familiar with. i have been able to rule out an aircraft, comet or meteor, drone, satellite (including iridium flashes), reflection of a laser off of a cloud (the only clouds in the sky that night were farther to the south), or atmospheric phenomenon.
content.summary: Bright object approached, hovered, abruptly changed course and ascended.

content.detailedDescription:
In the spring of 1987 i was playing with my cousin in the field behind my house.  i was 9 years old at the time and my cousin was 10.  the sky was clear and it was daytime.  i looked up at the sky and saw a black, vertical rectangle hovering above, just south of where we stood.  i remember looking over at my cousin who was also staring at it and asked her if she saw it too.  she said yes.  we both thought it looked like a black door or doorway.  we stared at it for several minutes waiting to see what would happen.  it barely moved although it did appear to be shaking or vibrating slightly.
 
finally my mother called out from the backyard to come in for dinner.  we left the field and the 'black door' and went back to my house.  we never discussed it with my parents and i've never seen anything like it since.

the reason why i decided to share my story is because i want to know if anyone else has a similar story to mine or can shed some light on what we saw.  recently i asked my cousin if she remembered what we saw in the field behind my house when we were kids.  she responded immediately saying, "do you mean the door in the sky?  i'll never forget it!"  

the black rectangle was hovering between 75-100 yards above the ground.
content.summary: Daytime sighting of what looked like a black doorway hovering 75-100 yards in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I live in compton ca, i was walking out of my back door around 4:40pm and looked up at the sky i noticed something black or rather dark that looked like an airplane at first, i heard a small airplane going by so i thought maybe this was also a small airplane since just a few blocks away is the compton airport but it was not making any noise. i started thinking it might be a drone but it had no lights on it. it seemed like it was getting closer towards me and it was not very high in the sky a little lower than an airplane and very visible even with some scattered clouds it ws still visible. it was moving quietly but fast and smooth it was hovering back and forth then it started going east at an angle going higher and faster i watched it until i could no longer see it in the sky it went so high into the sky all i could see was it looked like a dot and i just could not see ut anymire it was gone . it took off at an angle going in a rather straight steady direction into space. it was an amazing, a little scarey but very unforgettable. the event lasted about 5-10 mins my phone died right when i saw it so i was unable to get a video or picture of it.
content.summary: Dark square/triangle/circle objet hoovering with no lights

content.detailedDescription: I was 11 years old at the time and right after dinner i went outside to walk along the alley ways that run adjacent at the bottom of our street and was cracking ice with my boots from puddles that had frozen over.My memory is fading with time but i'm not exactly the reason why i looked up to the sky but perhaps the lights from this craft had caught my attention. as i stared in complete awe and amazement at this thing that if i had to guess was as large as a football stadium that was just hovering directly over me and was maybe just a couple hundred feet above the large maple tree that was there at the time. it made no sound at all. i do know exactly how old i was at the time because i came across a old picture that was the only time that was taken at that address,and although i was only 11 years old no body can tell me anything other then what i seen was a ufo. i knew that what i had witnessed was unearthly and not from our planet and up until that point in my life i had never even knew what u.F.O's were. the next day i told some kids about what i saw and was immediately made fun of except for one kid who turned to me and said "i saw the exact same thing last night when i was inside my tree fort". to this day almost 50 years later it has never left my mind and often wonder if any reports had been made between nov 1978 and around feb 1979 because this thing,after hovering over me for around 3 to 5 minutes took off heading in a southwesterly direction and had traveled right across the busy qew highway heading for the burlington skyway bridge. i have never looked into it or reported it till now but would really appreciate it if anything has ever been put on file about this incident because this had to have been seen by lots of people. i often have wondered about under going hypnosis to jog my memory. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: This was a very large object like a ball with lights pulsating all aroud it with no noise

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work on february 12th just before 5 p.M. when i noticed the sky looked interesting so having photograhy being a hobby of mine i decided i'd take some pictures of it with my samsung galaxy s5.  i held the camera horizontally and took 11 pictures.  i didn't look at the pictures until the next day when i wasn't working.   i wanted just the sky in the pictures so i started to zoom in on one of the photos to see what it would look like without the trees, vehicles and other objects in it.   when i did i noticed a round object with what looks like several lights on it in a distinctive pattern.  i thought it was odd so i started looking at the other photos.  this object appeared in 5 of the 11 photos and in different parts of the sk.  in two of them the object showed up clearly with the light pattern being vertical in one and horizontal in the other.   i did not see this object with my naked eye nor was i paying close attention to the details of the sky because i was driving. im attaching 4 photos in all.  two of the photos are the originals and the other two are pictures where i cropped and zoomed in on the object to give a closer look at the object i'm talking about.  i am hoping someone will contact me and tell me what this object is.  my email is [email removed/cms/tg]   i can also send the other photos if needed.

thanks
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Driving to work and decided to take pictures of what i thought was and interesting sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home new years eve 1-1-15 shortly after midnight.  i heard and saw fireworks that were in a totally different direction and neighborhood as this sighting.  as i turned left onto my street i saw red lights in the sky above moving from right to left across the street in a linear path.  it struck me odd as they seemed round and glowed red and following a path in the sky but definitely not a plane or helicopter.  they seemed to move much slower than an airplane.  as i drove towards the end of my street to my home i saw more red lights above my house moving across the sky - there were 2 red lights/objects that seemed connected to each other as they moved simultaneously.  i took out my iphone when i got out of my car and recorded the objects as they approached another white object in the sky above me.  i got scared and turned off the video and ran into the house.  you can hear the fireworks in the background but they were not coming from those objects as the fireworks were coming from a few streets over and i could no longer see those.  you can also hear my dogs barking as they were in the house and heard the fireworks and also heard me pull up in my car.  i am not sure what i saw above my house (on the video) were the same red lights/objects i saw when i first turned onto my street as i lost sight of those and they seemed to be heading in a different direction - they were moving across the sky above my street so it didn't make sense to me they would suddenly be at the end of my street above my house where i recorded them after getting out of the car.  they were definitely the same color and type but i'm not sure if there were the same lights/objects i first saw turning onto my street.
content.summary: Driving home new years eve shortly after midnight fireworks were heard but this sighting was unrelated to fireworks.  saw 2 red lights moving together in the midnight sky & approached 1 white lit object.

content.detailedDescription: I live close to the airport and very near one of the runways. we see planes take off and land all the time. seeing lights in the sky is nothing new in this area because of the airport. at about 8:15 pm on february 18, 2015 i just happened to look out my back window and saw a very bright blinking orb in the sky which was very different from the lights of the planes. it was about 300 meters away from my position, directly in front of me and about a mile up in the sky. i watched this object fly very slowly toward the northeast. it stopped in place and then turned right but only traveled in a southeast direction for a couple of seconds then turned back northeast. it travelled northeast very slowly for a couple of minutes then turned left toward the northwest. it travelled northwest for a few seconds then back northeast. it was either moving very slowly or it was stopped all together, but never moved quickly. after watching this for about 10 minutes it only moved maybe 200 or 300 meters. as i was watching it i noticed that the planes were circling around to the east instead of coming in for a landing, as if they were in a holding pattern. there were 4 planes in the sky around the edge of the city that i could see from my position and they were all following each other from west to east. then i saw the police helicopter with its green light fly towards the object from the direction of the airport. when the helicopter got within 100 meters from the object all of a sudden the lights went out and the object was gone. i didn't see it leave, like there was no streak of light and i couldn't see the orb fly away. it just disappeared. the police helicopter flew right by where the orb was last seen. it flew around in the general area for a few minutes then i didn't see it anymore. a few minutes later the planes started landing again. i was surprised to see all the social media hype about a crashed u.F.O. on an indian reserve in northern manitoba. my husband said i should report what i saw to someone because it occurred on the same night as the alleged crash up north with heavy military presence.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blinking multi coloured lights on orb close to airport

content.detailedDescription: All over canadian facebook. ufo crash landed in lake winnipeg. might be a hoax, but military was dispatched. asked residents of reserve to stay inside. seized cell phones. blocked off area. a few pictures got out. on site earth we.
content.summary: Lake winnipeg. ufocrfashed into frozen lake

content.detailedDescription: My grandkids came screaming in the house there was a ufo. i reluctantly followed them outside and i am pretty darn sure this was nothing ive ever seen before.  it was a red egg shaped light that was traveling from e to w in a northern direction. it traveled in an observablely large circular flight path and then turned around and went the opposite direction in the same circular flight path according to the children. i personally  observed it moving in a circular  direction.  this was not a plane or a helicopter.  beyond that i don't  know what we observed. i went inside to try and find my camera. when i got back outside a minute later, the kids had got in the car and locked the doors and were frightened.  i ask them why they were scared as it was not very close to us. they said it just scared them because it was so weird.  it was indeed, weird. and unfortunately gone by the time i located my camera.  it  appeared to be moving about where i would guess the superfund site is located. over pitcher, oklahoma.  its very hard to judge size and distance but it seemed about 15 miles out on the horizen. the light was solid. it never wavered blinked or acted in any way like plane or helicopter lights. it was truly bizarre. i should have reported this sooner but surely other people saw this. it was so obvious. it was not late at night.
content.summary: Red light on n horizon that moved in a circle and back and forth over about where super fund site would be

content.detailedDescription: My grandkids came screaming in the house there was a ufo. i reluctantly followed them outside and i am pretty darn sure this was nothing ive ever seen before.  it was a red egg shaped light that was traveling from e to w in a northern direction. it traveled in an observablely large circular flight path and then turned around and went the opposite direction in the same circular flight path according to the children. i personally  observed it moving in a circular  direction.  this was not a plane or a helicopter.  beyond that i don't  know what we observed. i went inside to try and find my camera. when i got back outside a minute later, the kids had got in the car and locked the doors and were frightened.  i ask them why they were scared as it was not very close to us. they said it just scared them because it was so weird.  it was indeed, weird. and unfortunately gone by the time i located my camera.  it  appeared to be moving about where i would guess the superfund site is located. over pitcher, oklahoma.  its very hard to judge size and distance but it seemed about 15 miles out on the horizen. the light was solid. it never wavered blinked or acted in any way like plane or helicopter lights. it was truly bizarre. i should have reported this sooner but surely other people saw this. it was so obvious. it was not late at night.
content.summary: Red light on n horizon that moved in a circle and back and forth over about where super fund site would be

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard smoking a cigarette, at night. when i caught a bright slow moving light from behind my neighbors trees. the object hovered from behind the trees over my neighbors house or front yard and made absolutely no noise. i immediately took out my iphone and started video taping the object. my cell phone was unable to capture the light from the object but soon after recording my video the object slowed down. right after the object flew away, a loud high-pitched screech is heard coming from the object and it quickly changed its path and flys upwards into the sky and disappears. 

 after, watching my video several times, i noticed something that i didn't see in person. right after the loud tone/screech, a caterpillar-shaped object flew around my head. it's hard to tell, but, the object looked like it was about 3-5 inches long and came about a foot away from my right ear. it also was moving extremely fast, faster than anything i could compare too. this 2nd object was only seen for about 1 second and only on camera. i took screenshots of whatever this was from the video i took.

if anyone has had any similar experiences or could help explain what this was or questions feel free to contact me..I'd really like to know what this was! 


p.S i whistled when the object was out of my line of site, idk why i whistled - i was doing the first thing that came to my head for hopes it would come back lol i guess it heard it
content.summary: Ufo made loud high-pitched tone/screech and video taped a strange light/object fly near my head.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch smoking a cigarette. i as usual was looking up at the sky and was a little upset because it was very cloudy at the time and i could not see the stars. out of the corner of my eye i noticed the moon was trying to break through the clouds in the north west sky. as i was watching the moon flicker through the clouds i saw a row of what i thought at first was a cluster of stars. upon further investigation i realized that the "stars" were very evenly spaced away from each other. i then stepped down my stairs still looking at the north west sky and saw that these lights that i was seeing were below the clouds and they were very evenly spaced away from each other in straight line boomerang formation. this was observed between the hours of 6 to 7 p.M. eastern standard time on feb. 22, 2015
content.summary: I saw a boomerang shaped object with as many as 10 or more stationary light pink or white lights in straight line angular formation

content.detailedDescription: I was about to pull into my apartment, when i look up and see two flying objects headed straight for one another at a ridiculous speed. it immediately caught my attention as i thought two planes or whatever was flying directly above my head, were gonna crash. we don't a big airport here so things aren't normally in the sky. there were two things coming from opposing sides straight at one another, and they just come to a complete stop facing each other. at this time i just of course reach for my dead phone and see the people in front of me totally fixated as well. couldn't be going more than 5 mph. as soon as they abruptly stop, three lights flashed on each object. one at a time each ship, but at the exact same time. then after the third light came on and off, a stripe of light came across each ship but coming from opposite directions. this was the only time you could see a little bit of the shape of each craft. without that light, it's like it had no shape. only to destinguish the three lights weren't straight. it was either oval or triangle the way the light pattern was. also, the sun was barely setting, so i could clearly see. i was stunned for a very long time. telling everyone, and them all laughing. then i tell my grandmother a week later, my cousin over hears me, pulls out gus phone. shows me this social network post he made the exact same day, when he saw the exact same thing around the same time i did. within 5-10 miles from where i saw them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two obejcts flying right at one another at a fast speed, abruptly stop right in front of one another.

content.detailedDescription:
this was an observation i made last night at approximately 2am (est) using the iss app on my cellphone.

i have the app loaded because it is interesting and i use a device called chromecast to put live camera feeds from around the world and the iss on our flat-screen television to help entertain my elderly mother.

last night, as i was going to bed, i just happened to want to see what the iss hd cam was showing.  and, to my great surprise, i saw ufo's of some sort-- quite a few in fact!

let me add that i just sent an e-mail to dr. michael salla of the honolulu exopolitics examiner.  this was because he was the only one i could find that seemed to be a point of contact to individuals that monitor the iss cams (in that he has written about iss ufo encounters).

i will now share with you, what i wrote to him:

hello doctor,

i just wanted to bring to your attention an iss feed that i saw last night that, as far as i can tell, did not make the news on sites, like yours, that report such events.  what i saw was an appearance of ufo's going beyond-- well beyond, in terms of number and visibility of craft, any iss encounters that i have yet seen published.

the view is from the hd cam that looks back at where the station has overflown-- the trailing cam.

what you will see is a walnut-shaped, blurry craft maintaining a distance to the iss where no details can be discerned.  this is in the upper right quadrant of the film.

emerging to the right and left of the center of the frame and level with each other are two, white glowing dots that within two minutes or so, close with the iss to be seen as bright green, glowing cubes.  together and at the same rate and maintaining the same distance from each other, these two craft come somewhat closer to the iss than the walnut-shaped craft-- but not close enough to discern details much beyond their shapes-- which were precisely the same by the way.  there was, i think, a small bright and steady goldish light in the center of each green cube.

meanwhile, five or more reddish-brown dots appear, scattered across the top third of the screen.  one of these, near the upper right edge becomes a dim, distant, saucer-like oval that maintains its distance from the iss.

when i oriented my cellphone to try to see the map display and find where the iss was over earth, the two, glowing green boxes had disappeared.

the reddish dots and the oval remained.

at this point the iss cam went off-line and then switched to the forward-looking (bow) cam.

there were no unusual objects to be seen in the field of vision of the forward (bow) cam.

since your organization seems to monitor these events, i thought you should know.

i hope this is helpful.

mark

now, let me add a few details that i didn't write to the doctor since i was then typing on my cellphone and that is quite tedious.

first, i think the oval, red disk did move left to right on screen.  and, to describe its color more accurately, since it was sharply defined and not glowing, it was the color of dark red clay.  brownish.

also, of the other reddish objects, i think two emerged as two tiny white lights.

and, as i recall the movement of the iss: i believe it was moving into earth's nighttime zone.

lastly, my viewing might have started before two am by around fifteen minutes or so since i can't recall if i looked at the time on my cellphone or using a clock that runs slowly in my bedroom.  i was so surprised at what i was viewing, i was not paying as much attention as i should have been.

this covers what i saw.  i am hoping that, like dr.Salla, mufon has individuals recording the hd camera feed from the iss.  with luck, you folks at mufon can find and view what i saw.  this is why i am checking 'other' in the 'additional evidence' section of this form.

i hope this submission is helpful.
content.summary: Iss observation on space stations trailing hd cam

content.detailedDescription:
As i exited kaluzhskaya subway station in moscow on my way to another night shift at the office, i noticed a bright red object that was out of place in the night sky. it was as bright as venus and appeared stationary. i'm very familiar with the night sky and was out of place. as i walked down the alley, i kept looking at the object. no apparent movements relative to stars during this time. approximately 3 minutes after i first took notice of it, it started moving eastbound slowly. within half a dozen seconds it started disappearing and a few seconds later was not visible anymore.

i'm an aviation enthusiast and i'm certain that was not a plane or helicopter.

as i got to work, i mentioned the object to my colleague who showed up about 10 minutes prior and walked down the same alley. he confirmed that he also took notice of the object, since it appeared out of place. he did not report any apparent movement.
content.summary: Bright red star-like object hovered for an unidentified period of time, moved and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Wow is all i can say. i had a very weird thing happen tonight. let me explain/ while leaving the local winn dixie parking lot at approx 745 pm i looked east and observed several amber lights in the sky. looked to be in the shape of the big dipper except they were really close and moving across the sky from east towards the northwest.
i called my wife and her and my son ran out of the house in time for them to also see them. and i heard no sound and observed no navigation lights that would normally be on any aircraft normal aircraft lights are not orange or amber. there were a total of about 10 or 12. could mot get pic on my phone. but my mom saw them as well...South brevard county, n e palm bay 
noticed lights because of their  brightness and formation they were in.
first thought it qa the big sipper but then realizes it was far to close and the lights were moving in mass. lost sight of them as they continued in a nw direction out of my sight. clear sky no cloud cover
content.summary: Lights appeared in formation like big dipper, moving in n w direction no noise or other craft in area
